card.name: Abu Ja'far
card.property: When Abu Ja'far dies, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by it. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Akron Legionnaire
card.property: Except for creatures named Akron Legionnaire and artifact creatures, creatures you control can't attack.

card.name: Angelic Voices
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control no nonartifact, nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Blood of the Martyr
card.property: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to any creature, you may have that damage dealt to you instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The willow knows what the storm does not: that the power to endure harm outlives the power to inflict it.

card.name: D'Avenant Archer
card.property: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Divine Offering
card.property: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: D'Haren stared at the twisted lump of metal that had been a prized artifact. The fight was getting ugly.

card.name: Indestructible Aura
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Theodar strode the battle lines, snatching swords with his bare hands and casting them aside until all cowered before him.

card.name: Ivory Guardians
card.property: Protection from red Creatures named Ivory Guardians get +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elite guard of the Mesa High Priests, the Ivory Guardians were created to protect the innocent and faithful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And then the Archangel Anthius spoke to them, saying, "Fear shall be vanquished by the Sword of Faith."

card.name: Petra Sphinx
card.property: {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, the player puts it into their graveyard.

card.name: Repentant Blacksmith
card.property: Protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For my confession they burned me with fire And found that I was for endurance made." —The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

card.name: Shield Wall
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: War Elephant
card.property: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When elephants fight it is the grass that suffers." —Kikuyu proverb

card.name: Witch Hunter
card.property: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Azure Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Azure Drake would be more powerful were it not so easily distracted.

card.name: Boomerang
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O! call back yesterday, bid time return." —William Shakespeare, King Richard the Second

card.name: Dance of Many
card.property: When Dance of Many enters the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature. When Dance of Many leaves the battlefield, exile the token. When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Dance of Many. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dance of Many unless you pay {U}{U}.

card.name: Dandân
card.property: Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân.

card.name: Enchantment Alteration
card.property: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

card.name: Fishliver Oil
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has islandwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Then the maiden bade him cast off his robes and cover his body with fishliver oil, that he might safely follow her into the sea.

card.name: Flash Flood
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target red permanent. • Return target Mountain to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

card.name: Juxtapose
card.property: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.

card.name: Puppet Master
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand. If that card is returned to its owner's hand this way, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, return Puppet Master to its owner's hand.

card.name: Recall
card.property: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

card.name: Remove Soul
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

card.name: Teleport
card.property: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step. Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Wall of Vapor
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Vapor by creatures it's blocking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walls of a castle are made out of stone,/ Walls of a house out of bricks or of wood./ My walls are made out of magic alone,/ Stronger than any that ever have stood."—Chrysoberyl Earthsdaughter, *Incantations*

card.name: Wall of Wonder
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So confusing is the Wall's appearance that few of its victims even see it move.

card.name: Banshee
card.property: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals half X damage, rounded down, to any target, and half X damage, rounded up, to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say Banshees are the hounds of Death, baying to herd their prey into the arms of their master.

card.name: Bog Rats
card.property: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their stench was vile and strong enough, but not nearly as powerful as their hunger.

card.name: Cuombajj Witches
card.property: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Slug
card.property: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

card.name: Hasran Ogress
card.property: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You might leave here, Chenndra, should another take your place . . . .

card.name: Shimian Night Stalker
card.property: {B}, {T}: All damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target attacking creature is dealt to Shimian Night Stalker instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out/ Contagion to this world."—William Shakespeare, *Hamlet*

card.name: Takklemaggot
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature. When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller chooses a creature that Takklemaggot could enchant. If the player does, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control attached to that creature. If they don't, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control as a non-Aura enchantment. It loses "enchant creature" and gains "At the beginning of that player's upkeep, Takklemaggot deals 1 damage to that player."

card.name: The Fallen
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, The Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent and planeswalker it has dealt damage to this game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magic often masters those who cannot master it.

card.name: The Wretched
card.property: At end of combat, gain control of all creatures blocking The Wretched for as long as you control The Wretched.

card.name: Transmutation
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me!"—Randall Jarrell, *The Woman at the Washington Zoo*

card.name: Wall of Shadows
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Shadows by creatures it's blocking. Wall of Shadows can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.

card.name: Yawgmoth Demon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you don't, tap Yawgmoth Demon and it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Active Volcano
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target blue permanent. • Return target Island to its owner's hand.

card.name: Aladdin
Beasts of Bogardan
card.property: Protection from red Beasts of Bogardan gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken white permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bogardan is a land as volatile as the creatures who live there.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

card.name: Fire Drake
card.property: Flying {R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Goblin Artisans
card.property: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, draw a card. If you lose the flip, counter target artifact spell you control that isn't the target of an ability from another creature named Goblin Artisans.

card.name: Goblin Digging Team
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!" "Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

card.name: Goblin Shrine
card.property: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0. When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew it weren't no ordinary pile of—you know." —Norin the Wary

card.name: Goblins of the Flarg
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.

card.name: Land's Edge
card.property: Discard a card: If the discarded card was a land card, Land's Edge deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Mountain Yeti
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Yeti's single greatest asset is its unnerving ability to blend in with its surroundings.

card.name: Primordial Ooze
card.property: Primordial Ooze attacks each combat if able. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Primordial Ooze. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap Primordial Ooze and it deals X damage to you.

card.name: Wall of Heat
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .

card.name: Wall of Opposition
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Wall of Opposition gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like so many obstacles in life, the Wall of Opposition is but an illusion, held fast by the focus and belief of the one who creates it.

card.name: Argothian Pixies
card.property: Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the rape of Argoth Forest during the rule of the artificers, the Pixies of Argoth bent their magic to more practical ends.

card.name: Cat Warriors
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

card.name: Cocoon
card.property: Enchant creature you control When Cocoon enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put three pupa counters on Cocoon. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during your untap step if Cocoon has a pupa counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a pupa counter from Cocoon. If you can't, sacrifice it, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature, and that creature gains flying.

card.name: Concordant Crossroads
card.property: All creatures have haste.

card.name: Craw Giant
card.property: Trample Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho! Midgets! You think you can stand in my way?"

card.name: Cyclone
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on Cyclone, then sacrifice Cyclone unless you pay {G} for each wind counter on it. If you pay, Cyclone deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Emerald Dragonfly
card.property: Flying {G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flittering, wheeling, / darting in to strike, and then / gone just as you blink."—*"Dragonfly Haiku,"* poet unknown

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Ghazbán Ogre
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Ghazbán Ogre.

card.name: Metamorphosis
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.name: Rabid Wombat
card.property: Vigilance Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

card.name: Revelation
card.property: Players play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many are in high place, and of renown: but mysteries are revealed unto the meek."—*Ecclesiasticus 3:19*

card.name: Scavenger Folk
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: String, weapons, wax, or jewels—it makes no difference. Leave nothing unguarded in Scarwood.

card.name: Storm Seeker
card.property: Storm Seeker deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Arcades Sabboth
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Arcades Sabboth unless you pay {G}{W}{U}. Each untapped creature you control gets +0/+2 as long as it's not attacking. {W}: Arcades Sabboth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Axelrod Gunnarson
card.property: Trample Whenever a creature dealt damage by Axelrod Gunnarson this turn dies, you gain 1 life and Axelrod deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Ayesha Tanaka
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source unless that ability's controller pays {W}. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Chromium
card.property: Flying Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chromium unless you pay {W}{U}{B}.

card.name: Dakkon Blackblade
card.property: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My power is as vast as the plains; my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins." —Dakkon Blackblade, Memoirs

card.name: Gabriel Angelfire
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep. (Whenever a creature with rampage 3 becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

card.name: Johan
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Johan gain "Johan can't attack" until end of combat. If you do, attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap this combat if Johan is untapped.

card.name: Kei Takahashi
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Marhault Elsdragon
card.property: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marhault Elsdragon follows a strict philosophy, never letting emotions cloud his thoughts. No chance observer could imagine the rage in his heart.

card.name: Nebuchadnezzar
card.property: {X}, {T}: Choose a card name. Target opponent reveals X cards at random from their hand. Then that player discards all cards with that name revealed this way. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

card.name: Palladia-Mors
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Palladia-Mors unless you pay {R}{G}{W}.

card.name: Rubinia Soulsinger
card.property: You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia and Rubinia remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the brave have cause to tremble at the sight of Sivitri Scarzam. Who else has tamed Scarzam's Dragon?

card.name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Whenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Stangg
card.property: When Stangg enters the battlefield, create Stangg Twin, a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token. Exile that token when Stangg leaves the battlefield. Sacrifice Stangg when that token leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Administrator of the military state of Sheoltun, Tobias Andrion is the military right arm of the empire and the figurehead of its freedom.

card.name: Tor Wauki
card.property: {T}: Tor Wauki deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Vaevictis Asmadi
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vaevictis Asmadi unless you pay {B}{R}{G}. {B}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Xira Arien
card.property: Flying {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Target player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A regular guest at the Royal Masquerade, Arien is the envy of the Court. She appears in a new costume every hour.

card.name: Arena of the Ancients
card.property: Legendary creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. When Arena of the Ancients enters the battlefield, tap all legendary creatures.

card.name: Ashnod's Altar
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Ashnod's Transmogrant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ashnod found few willing to trade their humanity for the power she offered them.

card.name: Barl's Cage
card.property: {3}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a dozen years the Cage had held Lord Ith, but as the Pretender Mairsil's power weakened, so did the bars.

card.name: Book of Rass
card.property: {2}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Bronze Horse
card.property: Trample As long as you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.

card.name: Feldon's Cane
card.property: {T}, Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

card.name: Fountain of Youth
card.property: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

card.name: Gauntlets of Chaos
card.property: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares one of those types with it. If those permanents are exchanged this way, destroy all Auras attached to them.

card.name: Horn of Deafening
card.property: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

card.name: Jalum Tome
card.property: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

card.name: Jeweled Bird
card.property: Remove Jeweled Bird from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}: Ante Jeweled Bird. If you do, put all other cards you own from the ante into your graveyard, then draw a card.

card.name: Living Armor
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Living Armor: Put X +0/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it affords excellent protection, few don this armor. The process is uncomfortable and not easily reversed.

card.name: Obelisk of Undoing
card.property: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you both own and control to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Battle of Tomakul taught Urza not to rely on fickle reinforcements.

card.name: Rakalite
card.property: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Return Rakalite to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza was the first to understand that the war would not be lost for lack of power, but for lack of troops.

card.name: Runesword
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Runesword. If the creature deals damage to a creature this turn, the creature dealt damage can't be regenerated this turn. If a creature dealt damage by the targeted creature would die this turn, exile that creature instead.

card.name: Sentinel
card.property: {0}: Change Sentinel's base toughness to 1 plus the power of target creature blocking or blocked by Sentinel. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Serpent Generator
card.property: {4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Snake artifact creature token. It has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.

card.name: Triassic Egg
card.property: {3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg. Sacrifice Triassic Egg: Choose one — • You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.

card.name: Voodoo Doll
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pin counter on Voodoo Doll. At the beginning of your end step, if Voodoo Doll is untapped, destroy Voodoo Doll and it deals damage to you equal to the number of pin counters on it. {X}{X}, {T}: Voodoo Doll deals damage equal to the number of pin counters on it to any target. X is the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.

card.name: City of Brass
card.property: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Safe Haven
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.
